lead_paragraph: BECK--Leland Stuart, was born May 6, 1931 to Jenny and Stanley Beck in New Jersey. He passed on January 21, 2016. Leland's was a life well lived. He was a loving husband and brother. He had four children, eight grandchildren, and one great- grandchild. Leland and his wife Phyllis fell in love while attending Cornell University. Leland practiced law for more than 60 years. Sailing, his family and his work were his sustaining passions. He will be remembered for his good humor, generosity, loyalty, integrity, unfailing optimism and amazing work ethic. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions to Cycle for Survival team 52061 The Motley Cruise at: cycleforsurvival.org or Immunitor.com 1/3
